resources.string: After the 1-Up mushroom placed on the broken sidewalk, there should be another broken sidewalk platform with the blue coin in plain sight.

Using the boat, get to the platform at the end of the volcano area.

Get all the outer coins first. If you crash at this point, that\'s OK.

Now, get all the coins in the inner area. Hover but don\'t jump to the blue coins and then hover back.

Using the boat, get to the platform at the end of the volcano area.

Get all the outer coins first. If you crash at this point, that\'s OK.

Now, get all the coins in the inner area. Hover but don\'t jump to the blue coins and then hover back.
